message.name: ERR_FV_ATTACHMENT_MANDATORY
message.locale: The associated attachment id must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_CLASSIFICATION_MANDATORY
message.locale: The document classification must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_ATTACHMENT_INFO_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: This record has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_FV_ATTACHMENT_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: Cannot add or modify details when corresponding Attachment record is cancelled.
